function.name: gradle
function.description: Adds a [build step](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/teamcity/?Gradle) running gradle script @see GradleBuildStep

param.name: ui.gradleRunner.gradle.tasks.names
param.description: Space separated task names, when not set the 'default' task is used

param.name: ui.gradleRunner.gradle.incremental
param.description: When set to true the :buildDependents task will be run on projects affected by changes

param.name: teamcity.build.workingDir
param.description: Custom working directory for gradle script

param.name: ui.gradleRunner.gradle.home
param.description: Path to the Gradle home directory (parent of 'bin' directory). Overrides agent GRADLE_HOME environment variable

param.name: ui.gradleRunner.additional.gradle.cmd.params
param.description: Additional parameters will be added to the 'Gradle' command line

param.name: ui.gradleRunner.gradle.wrapper.useWrapper
param.description: Whether TeamCity should look for Gradle Wrapper scripts in the checkout directory and run script using it

param.name: ui.gradleRunner.gradle.wrapper.path
param.description: Optional path to the Gradle wrapper script, relative to the working directory

param.name: ui.gradleRunner.gradle.debug.enabled
param.description: Whether Gradle should be executed with the -d option

param.name: ui.gradleRunner.gradle.stacktrace.enabled
param.description: Whether Gradle should be executed with the -s option

param.name: target.jdk.home
param.description: Custom [JDK](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/teamcity/?Predefined+Build+Parameters#PredefinedBuildParameters-DefiningJava-relatedEnvironmentVariables) to use. The default is JAVA_HOME environment variable or the agent's own Java.

param.name: jvmArgs
param.description: Space-separated list of additional arguments for JVM

example.description: Adds a simple Gradle step with custom tasks and build file determined by Gradle. Gralde Wrapper located in the checkout directory is used.

Add a Gradles build step with custom Gradle task and build file localted in also custom [working directory](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/teamcity/?Build+Working+Directory). Gradle inctemental buildling feature is enabled. Additional Gradle command line parameters is specified with a reference to a [configutation parameter](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/teamcity/?Using+Build+Parameters). Gralde build step is set up not to use Gradle Wrapper, so Gradle will be taken from the agent's GRADLE_HOME environment variable. Additional [run parameter](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/teamcity/?Gradle#Run+Parameters) for printing stacktrace is enabled. This step will be run inside a [Docker](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/teamcity/?Gradle#Docker+Settings) container. IDEA-based [code coverage](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/teamcity/?Gradle#Code+Coverage) is enabled.

Adds a Gradle build step with 'default' Gradle task and custom Gradle build file. Gradle Wrapper using is disabeld, so Gradle will be taken with a reference to an [environment variable](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/teamcity/?Using+Build+Parameters). JDK is set to the [environment variable](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/teamcity/?Using+Build+Parameters) value with custom command line [parameters](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/teamcity/?Gradle#Java+Parameters). This build step will run even if some previous build steps are failed.
